Package org.jboss.elemento

Interface HtmlContent<E extends elemental2.dom.HTMLElement,​B extends TypedBuilder<E,​B>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IsElement<E>, TextContent<E,​B>, TypedBuilder<E,​B>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HtmlContentBuilder
    public interface HtmlContent<E extends elemental2.dom.HTMLElement,​B extends TypedBuilder<E,​B>>
extends TextContent<E,​B>
    Builder for container-like elements with inner HTML.
